alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Russell and northeastern Barton Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milberger, or 12 miles north of Hoisington, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell, Lucas, Luray, Dorrance, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Susank, Waldo, Wilson State Park, Wilson Lake and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 182 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
